name: Tough Coded Live IV
description:
ORIGINALLY BY LEMONCHILI GAMES NOW MANAGED BY MAX LEVEL STUDIOS!!!

GET READY TO GET YOUR ARSE KICKED! Tough Coded is the ONLY live coded shootem-up side scrolling game! And to top it all off, you play to some of the most kick*** tunes out there! Appeared in SXSW and Tokyo Game Show.

TOUGH CODED IS A ONE-OF-A-KIND INTERACTIVE ONLINE EXPERIENCE, RUN LIVE BY A GAME MASTER! You've never played a game like this! Awesome music, awesome gameplay... that's constantly being live coded in, and an awesome time with players competing for the same goal... to survive!

TOUGH CODED is a tough, tough, really tough highscore game for hardcore shump players. Scores are reset every off-season game, and every season and REAL rewards are given to the best players at the end of the season.

YOU ARE PIT AGAINST PLAYERS AROUND THE WORLD FOR AWESOME REWARDS, UNDER THE WRATH OF LITTLE NANDO, THE ULTIMATE GAME MASTER! Challenge Little Nando, or just try to survive the craziness that's on screen! No two play throughs are the same!

At the moment, all games are running on Tuesdays and Fridays at 8PM EST.

IMPORTANT: This game features really fast moving images and changing colors, and is NOT recommended, at all, for epileptics.
